channel.title: No Servers being displayed in Server Browser
channel.description:
Hi, I'm not able to join any bms servers, because they are not displayed in the server browser. I've already checked if there a problem with my antivirus program (which sometimes blocks programs/agamesfrom accessing the internet for no reason), but it doesn't seem to be at fault. I've also looked at the steam server browser, but it also does not display any servers.
I hope this is enough information to solve the problem, below are screenshots. [spoiler=Message displayed in the Internet Tab of the server browser][img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/693902535306251389/796DD9CEA233A735C46E66931F1DC0822D8AB4A7/[/img][/spoiler] [spoiler=Even the History Tab does not work ][img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/693902535306251389/796DD9CEA233A735C46E66931F1DC0822D8AB4A7/[/img][/spoiler] [spoiler=The Steam Server Browser][img]https://s8.postimg.org/k1g1bjnz9/Unbenannt.png[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: No Servers being displayed in Server Browser
item.dc:creator: Baconsandwich
item.description:
Sage J. Fox:

Are you in the Beta? Believe they said that it’d be incompatible with multiplayer…

“Right now, you cannot play multiplayer while in the Public Beta Branch, unless explicitly said, or you’re playing on a Beta Server… There are currently no Beta servers, so you won’t be doing anything with Multiplayer, just yet.”

Yes, i was in the beta for some reason.Everything works now, thanks you

Read full topic
item.source: No Servers being displayed in Server Browser

item.title: No Servers being displayed in Server Browser
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
Unless you’re in the Beta (like Sage J. Fox pointed above), it could be either an anti-virus blocking some features of the game or your firewall.

Try to add Steam and BMS as exceptions to both (if they aren’t there already) or disable one of them and see how it turns out.

Read full topic
item.source: No Servers being displayed in Server Browser
